question: tolong buatlah 5 kalimat Simple Present Tense ( pakai kata kerja / verbs ) bentuk positive ( + ), bentuk negative ( - ), bentuk interrogative ( ? ) beserta jawabannya

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Simple Present Tense:

(+) S + V1 (+s/es)

(-) S + do/does + not + Infinitive

(?) Do/does + S + Infintive

1. (+) She loves English

(-) She does not love English

(?) does she love English ?

2. (+) You are my best friend

(-) You are not my best friend

(?) are you my best friend ?

3. (+) I know who you are

(-) I do not know who you are

(?) do i know who you are ?

4. (+) they love their mother

(-) they do not love their mother

(?) Do they love their mother?

5. (+) you are sleepy

(-) you are not sleepy

(?) Are you sleepy ?

*jadikan brainliest ya

cmiiw

answers.answer:
Yerusalem or Palestine is the place of the presence of the three heavenly religions. The sound of the call to prayer from the minarets, the sound of church bells, and Hebrew chants from the synagogue, often sounded together.

Palestine, for Palestine we pray shortly after praying for personal reasons. Don't underestimate the Palestinian state, they survive on their land. not for their personal survival but, for Islam too .. because the Aqsa mosque stands majestically there.

I have remembered, someone asked one of them "why are you staying in Palestine? why don't you go?" then they (the Palestinians) replied,"We are still living in Palestine on behalf of the Muslims. If not us, who will protect us?"

Everyone knows that Palestine is one of the holiest places for Muslims, Christians and Jews.

There is the Al-Aqsa Mosque, the Holy Church of the Holy Sepulcher, and the Wailing Wall. From these places, the name of the Great and One God was echoed in various languages and dialeg.

so, if we humans try to help in any way, pray, help services or funds. remind them that they are not alone.

yarussalem atau Palestina.

adalah tempat hadirnya tiga agama langit. Suara azan dari menara masjid, bunyi lonceng gereja, dan kidung-kidung Ibrani dari sinagoge, acap terdengar bersamaan.

untuk Palestina kami berdoa sesaat setelah berdoa untuk alasan pribadi. Jangan meremehkan negara Palestina, mereka bertahan di tanah mereka. bukan untuk kelangsungan hidup pribadi mereka tetapi, untuk Islam juga.Jangan meremehkan negara Palestina, mereka bertahan di tanah mereka. bukan untuk kelangsungan hidup pribadi mereka tapi, untuk Islam juga.. karena masjid Aqsa berdiri megah disana.

aku ingat, seseorang bertanya kepada salah satu dari mereka "kenapa kamu tinggal di palestina? kenapa kamu tidak pergi?" kemudian mereka (orang-orang Palestina) menjawab, “Kami masih hidup di Palestina atas nama umat Islam. Jika bukan kami, siapa yang akan melindungi?

Semua orang tahu bahwa Palestina adalah salah satu tempat paling suci bagi umat Islam, Kristen, dan Yahudi.

Ada Masjid Al-Aqsa, Gereja Suci Makam Suci, dan Tembok Ratapan.Dari tempat-tempat tersebut, nama Tuhan Yang Maha Esa dikumandangkan dalam berbagai bahasa dan dialeg.

jadi, jika kita manusia berusaha lah membantu dengan cara apapun, berdoa, membantu jasa ataupun dana. ingatkan mereka bahwa mereka tidak sendiri

related_questions.question:
My uncle's house is situated on a hill. It has very beautiful hilly green rice field scenery.    There is a (1) ... farm at the backyard. My uncle really loves and keeps the chicken well.
The house is not (2)..., but it is lovely and clean. I love staying there. This is the place
where my uncle's family spends most of their time together. It has three bedrooms, a living
room, a dining room, a (3) ..., and two bathrooms.
At the front, there is a living room. Next to this room, there is a dining room. My uncle's
bedroom is near the dining room. The bedroom is (4)... and warm. There is a kitchen and
two bathrooms at the back of the house.
Each room has some furniture. My uncle (5) ... the furniture properly. They are not
expensive, but he always keeps them free from dust. He does this because he wants to
make his house seen as the nicest place to live in.
a. arranges
b.
chicken
C. neat
d. big
kitchen
e.​
We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

we went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

past tense jd v2

Jawaban:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

Past tense merupakan kata yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan kejadian yang telah terjadi di masa lampau.

Perbedaannya dengan present tense adalah verb yang digunakan.

Present tense menggunakan verb 1, dan past tense menggunakan verb 2.

Maka verb 2 dari go adalah:

go → went

Past Tense Sentences:

We went to the beach two weeks ago
